description:
The pre-registration for business simulation mobile game Trading Legend has started! Build your business empire in an ancient world!



------The Secrets to Wealth------



-Start your business as a humble shopkeeper
A bustling town featured unique traditional Chinese painting art style.
Inn, theatre, bun shop... Run various stores in an ancient era.
Start from scratch, find the way to become a tycoon!



-Recruit capable retainers
Mortician, sorcerer, tomb raider... What are the secrets behind these old professions?
Retainers are categorized into five different classes: Scholar, Peasant, Artisan, Merchant, and Rover. Wisely deploy them to different stores to raise their total earnings!
Upgrade your retainers to get the upper hand in Trade War!



-Meet exotic beauties
The smart chess player, the lovely young maid, the charming dancer... Who will eventually be the true love of yours?
Establish romantic relationships with beauties and experience traditional Chinese weddings.
The bond between beauties and retainers can even further increase your total earnings!



-Raise heirs
Raise up your heirs with love.
Be a worried parent in the game. You might get a pair of twins if you're lucky (or unlucky) enough!
Arrange matching marriages for your heirs. Join hands with your in-laws to achieve triumphs for your businesses.



-Travel along the ancient trade routes
Step on the Silk Road to explore more business opportunities.
Handle a variety of events during the trip for heaps of rewards!

The pre-registration for business simulation mobile game Trading Legend has started! Download now to be the most powerful magnate in the Song dynasty of ancient China!
